roleset.name: come over the top of a hill, etc.

example.name: unexpected intransitive as 'reach a peak'
example.text: Some analysts predict that disappointment in Mr. Gandhi 's spent pledge to reduce corruption and heavy - handed local government will crest at the polls .

propbank.arg: disappointment in Mr. Gandhi 's spent pledge to reduce corruption and heavy - handed local government

example.name: the usage I expected
example.text: John crested Mt. Everest after a record - setting fifteen years , three months , two weeks , five days , 21 hours , 13 minutes and 48 seconds since leaving base camp .

propbank.arg: after a record - setting fifteen years , three months , two weeks , five days , 21 hours , 13 minutes and 48 seconds since leaving base camp

roleset.note: CREST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'crest' based on sentences in wsj. NO access to verbnet at the moment. (from crest.01-v predicate notes)
